text: Animal Crossing feels like your little place of comfort and relaxation in digital form. I've always found the 7PM theme from this game memorable because it feels quite different from the other hours (bonus points for rhodes), so it's great that it was during a time I'd often play. Animal Crossing Switch please?
author: SupraDarky
